comments:
I have a project that doesn't define ECLIPSE_HOME as a variable so when I try to export, the task exits silently. Defining a variable using Project|Properties|Java Build Path|Add Variable fixes the issue and creates the build.xml.

 The exception from .log is:

Thank you for the bug report
Changes to AntPropertyValueProvider and BuildFileCreator to handle no eclipse home variable.
